title: E-Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: Online Collaborative Science Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and experience using online collaboration tools
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can divide and execute step-by-step roles in science experiment design using online collaboration tools
Learners can complete a draft of a science report within 48 hours through synchronous/asynchronous communication with group members
Learners can improve the scientific validity of group projects by over 80% by applying peer assessment routines

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
